alert.note: Alert for Chase; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 2:58PM CDT until May 09 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CHASE AND NORTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burdick, or 13 miles southeast of Herington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood Falls, Strong City, Lincolnville, Lost Springs, Elmdale, Hymer, Tallgrass Prairie and Tallgrass Prairie Preserve. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
